ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] Darkwood Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... is that the one that you give a NPC in the Temple of Solusek Ro a Lambent stone then you get it?  Not sure but I got a staff by doing that, will look at
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... is that the one that you give a NPC in the Temple of Solusek Ro a
Lambent stone then you get it? Not sure but I got a staff by doing that,
will look at it tonight to see if it's a Darkwood staff as I'm not sure what
it's called off hand...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joel Jeffress [SMTP:jeffress@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 04, 2000 7:02 PM
> To: EQ-Quest@egroups.com
> Subject: [EQ-Quest] Darkwood Staff
>
> Does anyone know about this quest item? It is listed on the EQ
> Casters Realm weapon page as a 1HB staff that is magic. Am
> interested
> in trying to find it. Thanks
